thread.title: Senate threatens to issue arrest warrant on Customs chief
thread.title_full: Senate threatens to issue arrest warrant on Customs chief

author: Onyedi Ojiabor, Abuja
title: Senate threatens to issue arrest warrant on Customs chief
text:
Home News Update Senate threatens to issue arrest warrant on Customs chief Senate threatens to issue arrest warrant on Customs chief Posted By: Onyedi Ojiabor, Abuja on: March 15, 2017 Tweet 0 
The Senate on Wednesday resolved to compel the Comptroller General of the Nigeria Customs Service, Col. Hameed Ali (retd), to appear before the lawmakers on Thursday. 
The Senate also vowed to issue warrant of arrest on Ali if he fails to appear at the Senate chamber to brief senators on some Customs policies, notably the introduction of import duties on old vehicles.
